directQuotes.quote: I spend more time figuring out what to post than actually running my business
Every time I think I've figured out the algorithm, it changes again
I just want someone to tell me exactly what to do and I'll do it
My competitors seem to have it all figured out and I'm still guessing
directQuotes.context: Comparing themselves to others in the market

painPoints.pain: No clear marketing strategy or system
Overwhelmed by too many marketing channels
exactPhrases: which platform should I focus on

painPoints.pain: Content creation takes too much time
Don't know if marketing efforts are working

desireStatements: I want a simple system I can follow without thinking
I want to know exactly who I'm talking to and what they need to hear
I want my marketing to feel authentic, not salesy
I want to spend less time on marketing and more time serving clients
urgencyIndicators: Revenue is flat and I need to grow NOW
I've already wasted money on courses that didn't help
